The Oklahoma LoCo puts out a monthly/bi-monthly newsletter reporting on the happenings in the Oklahoma Ubuntu Community and the Ubuntu Community at large. In addition to news it also features links and summaries of other newsletters, magazines and podcasts. There is also a links section filled with Ubuntu/Linux related links.<<BR>>
If you would like to contribute a one time story, or a reoccurring article , <nowiki>[[ http:--www.wiki.ubuntu.com-duanedesign | email me]]</nowiki>.
